tuv.seg: If you have left school without any formal qualifications, the Youthreach programme can provide you with opportunities for basic education, personal development, vocational training and work experience
Má d'fhág tú an scoil gan aon chailíochtaí foirmiúla, tá deiseanna ar fáil ó chlár Ógtheagmhála bunoideachas, forbairt phearsanta, oiliúint ghairmoideachais agus taithí oibre a fháil
The programme is generally full-time, although part-time courses can be arranged
Clár lán-aimseartha atá ann den chuid is mó, ach is féidir cúrsaí páirtaimseartha a shocrú
You can concentrate on a core training area of your choice but basic subjects, such as English, maths and life skills, are generally covered by all trainees
Is féidir béim a leagan ar do rogha príomhábhar oiliúna ach beidh bunábhair, ar nós an Bhéarla, na matamaitice agus scileanna saoil, clúdaithe go ginearálta ag gach oiliúnóir
Opportunities to improve literacy and numeracy are available at all Youthreach centres
Tá deis feabhas a chur ar scileanna litearthachta agus uimhearthachta ar fáil ag na hionaid Ógtheagmhála ar fad
The course generally lasts from 1 to 2 years, although it can be flexible, depending on your individual needs
Is gnách go maireann an cúrsa idir 1 agus 2 bhliain ach is féidir leis a bheith solúbtha, ag brath ar do riachtanais aonair
If you complete the basic training successfully, you will be awarded a Foundation Certification from Quality and Qualifications Ireland (QQI) or the Junior Certificate
Má éiríonn leat an bhunoiliúint a chríochnú, bronnfar Bonnteastas (ó Dhearbhú Cáilíochta agus Cáilíochtaí Éireann (QQI) nó Teastas Sóisearach ort)
Having completed a Foundation Programme, you may continue to a Progression Programme
Má tá Bonnchlár críochnaithe agat, is féidir leat dul ar aghaidh agus tabhairt faoi Chlár Fochéimnithe

This will give you the opportunity to progress to the Leaving Certificate Applied course or a higher-level QQI award or you can choose to continue other skills training, such as an apprenticeship course

Tabharfaidh sé seo an deis duit dul ar aghaidh agus tabhairt faoin Ardteistiméireacht Fheidhmeach nó faoi ardchúrsa QQI nó is féidir leat roghnú dul ar aghaidh agus oiliúint i scileanna eile a dhéanamh, mar shampla, is féidir leat cúrsa printíseachta a dhéanamh
The courses take place in Youthreach centres managed by Education and Training Boards (ETBs) and Community Training Centres
Bíonn na cúrsaí á reáchtáil in ionaid Ógtheagmhála atá á mbainistiú ag Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOOanna) agus in Ionaid Oiliúna Pobail
Generally, Youthreach centres are open for 35 hours per week (9 a.m. - 4.30 p.m., Monday to Friday)
Go ginearálta, bíonn ionaid Ógtheagmhála oscailte ar feadh 35 uair a chloig sa tseachtain (9am-4.30pm ó Luan go hAoine)
If you qualify for Youthreach, you may also be eligible for the Back to Education Initiative
Má cháilíonn tú d’Ógtheagmháil, d’fhéadfá bheith i dteideal bheith páirteach sa Tionscnamh um Fhilleadh ar Oideachas
Education and Training Boards
Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna
Since 1 July 2013, Education and Training Boards (ETBs) replaced Vocational Educational Committees (VECs)
Ón 1 Iúil 2013, tháinig Boird Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOOanna) in ionad Coistí Gairmoideachais (VECanna)
All services provided by VECs will continue to be provided by ETBs
Leanfaidh na BOOanna leis an uile sheirbhís a sholáthraíonn VECanna a chur ar fáil
FÁS training centres have also transferred to ETBs
Aistreofar Ionaid Oiliúna Pobail go dtí BOOanna ar bhonn céimnithe ar aon dul le bunú SOLAS
The criteria you must meet to access the Youthreach programme depends on whether you apply to a Youthreach centre managed by an Education and Training Board (ETB) or a Community Training Centre

Braitheann na critéir nach mór duit a chomhlíonadh chun an clár Ógtheagmhála a rochtain ar cibé acu an ndéanann tú iarratas ag ionad Ógtheagmhála atá á bhainistiú ag Bord Oideachais agus Oiliúna (BOO) nó ag Ionad Oiliúna Pobail
To be eligible for Youthreach provided by your local ETB, you should be between 15 and 20 years of age
Le bheith i dteideal bheith páirteach in Ógtheagmháil a sholáthraíonn do BOO áitiúil, ba cheart duit bheith idir 15 agus 20 bliain d’aois
You must be unemployed and an early school leaver without any vocational training and who has not attempted the Leaving Certificate
Ní mór duit bheith dífhostaithe agus bheith mar luathfhágóir scoile, agus ní mór nár cuireadh aon oiliúint gairmoideachais ort agus nár thug tú faoin Ardteistiméireacht
Some exceptions can be made to this rule, for example if you are a lone parent
Féadtar eisceachtaí áirithe a dhéanamh i leith na rialach seo, mar shampla, más tuismitheoir aonair thú
Community Training Centre Youthreach programme
Clár Ógtheagmhála Ionad Oiliúna Pobail
To be eligible for Youthreach provided by your local Community Training Centre, you should be between 16 and 21 years of age
Le bheith i dteideal bheith páirteach in Ógtheagmháil a sholáthraíonn d’Ionad Oiliúna Pobail áitiúil, ba cheart duit bheith idir 16 agus 21 bliain d’aois
However, young people under the age of 25 who are disadvantaged and unemployed may attend the programme with agreement from SOLAS
Féadfaidh daoine óga faoi 25 bliain d’aois atá faoi mhíbhuntáiste agus atá dífhostaithe freastal ar an gclár, áfach, tar éis go ndéanann SOLAS comhaontú air seo
The training on offer varies from centre to centre, often depending on the facilities available
Braitheann an oiliúint a bhíonn ar fáil ó ionad go hionad, agus braitheann sé ar na háiseanna atá ar fáil go minic
If you have an interest in a particular career, you should look around for a centre offering a suitable course rather than applying automatically to the centre nearest to you
Más spéis leat gairm ar leith, ba cheart duit ionad a aimsiú ina gcuirtear ar fáil cúrsa oiriúnach, seachas iarratas a dhéanamh láithreach bonn ar an ionad is giorra duit
Participants leaving Youthreach can apply for a jobseeker’s payment
Is féidir le rannpháirtithe ag fágáil Youthreach cur isteach ar an íocaíocht cuardaitheora poist
The 3 month disqualification rule which applies to many students does not apply to Youthreach participants
Ní bhaineann an riail dhícháilithe trí mhí le rannpháirtithe Youthreach
Courses are free and trainees aged over 16 receive a weekly allowance
Tá an cúrsa saor in aisce agus tugtar liúntas seachtainiúil d’oiliúnaithe atá os cionn 16 bliana d’aois
You will get a travel allowance if you have to travel 5 km or more to the centre
Gheobhaidh tú liúntas taistil má tá ort breis agus 4.9km a thaisteal chuig an ionad
You may also qualify for free childcare and a meal allowance - you should check with the centre
Anuas air sin, d’fhéadfá cáiliú freisin do chúram leanaí agus do liúntas béilí – ba cheart duit seiceáil leis an ionad
The 2016 weekly allowances are as follows:
Is iad seo a leanas liúntais sheachtainiúla 2016:
Trainee(s) maximum payment per week
16 bliana d’aois €40 (iontrálaithe nua)
18 years and over €160.00 (with some exceptions)
18 mbliana d’aois agus níos sine €160 (roinnt eisceachtaí i gceist)

If you are over 18 years of age and you are currently getting a social welfare payment of more than €160, you will continue to get the higher amount while you are on Youthreach as long as you are eligible

Má tá tú os cionn 18 mbliana d’aois agus má tá íocaíocht leasa shóisialaigh breis agus €160 á fáil agat, leanfaidh tú leis an tsuim níos airde a fháil fad a bhíonn tú páirteach in Ógtheagmháil a fhad a bhíonn tú i dteideal
If you were getting a reduced age-related Jobseeker's Allowance (JA) before starting Youthreach any means that were deducted from your JA will also be deducted from your training allowance
Má bhí Liúntas Cuardaitheora Poist laghdaithe aoischoibhneasa (LCP) á fháil agat sular thosaigh tú le hÓgtheagmháil, asbhainfear aon mhaoin a asbhaineadh ó do LCP ó do liúntas oiliúna chomh maith
This also applies to people getting a reduced age-related basic Supplementary Welfare Allowance (SWA)
Baineann seo le daoine a bhfuil Liúntas Leasa Fhorlíontaigh bunúsach aoischoibhneasa (LLF) á fháil acu
Youthreach courses are held year-round and you can apply to join a course at any time
Bíonn cúrsaí Ógtheagmhála ar siúl i rith na bliana go léir, agus is féidir leat clárú le haghaidh cúrsa ag aon tráth ar bith
Contact your local Youthreach centre or Community Training Centre and talk to staff about your training needs and interests
Déan teagmháil le d’ionad áitiúil Ógtheagmhála nó le d’Ionad Oiliúna Pobail agus labhair leis an bhfoireann faoi do chuid riachtanais oiliúna agus faoi na hábhair is díol spéise duit
You can also contact your local employment services office or ETB
Chomh maith leis sin, féadfaidh tú teagmháil a dhéanamh le d’oifig áitiúil seirbhísí fostaíochta nó le BOO
Staff members are available at these centres to help you with application forms if necessary
Tá fáil ar chomhaltaí foirne ag na hionaid seo chun cabhrú leat le foirmeacha iarratais, más gá
